page.text: The draconian looms over you in all her sexy yet intimidating glory and looks down upon you with a smirk she scorns, rubbing in her victory. Though as she regards you and assesses you can tell she intends to make her victory total and her domination over you complete. You can see in her eyes the moment she makes her decision and says that

choice.text: &all you're good for is to sate my lust
a fate too terrible to contemplate

page.text: "An ignoble fate is fitting for a small thing such as you."

gameover.text: It would seem you've met a terrible fate
